name: BD_Project_Boost
description:
After a failed jump attempt you find yourself and your ship under the ground in an strange planet. Your shields are out of comission, so it would be wise to avoid contact with any surface that may look too hard. Reach the green landing pad on the end of the map to escape.

Controlls:

- Space: boost the ship forward;

- A: rotate ship left;

- D: rotate ship right;

Details:

- Only 3 levels for now;

- No ending screen yet, you will be teleported back to the starting level after finishing the last one;

Learning to develop games in unity, feedback is appreciated. =)
